design_philosophy.identity: The Anti-AI Designer (E1) - Context: Rural Health Education
core_values: Cultural Authenticity: Warm, earthy, relatable to rural Maharashtra.
Accessibility First: High contrast, large touch targets for tablet use in sunlight.
Clarity over Style: The message (nutrition) is life-saving; design must not distract.

primary.description: Deep Earth Orange / Terracotta - Represents soil, warmth, home.

secondary.description: Dark Olive Green - Represents nutrition, vegetables, growth.

background.description: Warm Off-White / Paper - Reduces glare compared to pure white.

text.description: Dark Warm Brown - Softer and more natural than pure black.

accent.description: Harvest Gold - For highlights and key actions.

typography.rules: Headings must use the Serif font to convey authority and tradition. Body text must be Sans-serif for maximum legibility on low-res tablet screens.

layout_strategy.spacing: Relaxed. Use p-6 or p-8 for cards to allow thumb-safe interaction areas.

modes.landing: Hero section with warm illustration, clear 'Start' CTA, 3-column download grid.
modes.viewer: Focused single-card view. Dominant 'Next/Prev' controls. Toggle switch for Family/Sakhi side.

FlipbookViewer.description: The core experience. Displays one spread at a time.
interactions: Tap 'Flip' button to rotate card from Image (Family) to Text (Sakhi).
Progress bar at bottom indicating page 1/24.
FlipbookViewer.style: bg-white shadow-xl rounded-xl border border-[#E5E0D8] overflow-hidden aspect-[3/4] md:aspect-[4/3] relative

DownloadCard.style: bg-white p-6 rounded-lg shadow-md hover:shadow-lg transition-shadow border-t-4 border-[#C05621]
DownloadCard.elements: Icon (PDF), Title (e.g., 'Full Flipbook'), Size Label, 'Download' Button.

Navigation.style: Fixed bottom bar on mobile, floating side arrows on desktop. Large touch targets (min 48px).

images.usage: Landing page hero background or main visual
Placeholder for Sakhi Side counseling text background

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react'. Key icons: BookOpen, Download, ChevronLeft, ChevronRight, RotateCcw (for flip), Users (Family), UserCheck (Sakhi).

accessibility_checklist: Contrast Ratio: Ensure text is #2D241E on #FDFBF7 (approx 15:1 ratio).
Touch Targets: All buttons must be at least 44x44px.
Alt Text: All flipbook images must have descriptive alt text for screen readers.
No reliance on color alone: Use text labels alongside icons (e.g., 'Download PDF' not just an icon).
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Setup Shadcn UI but customize the `radius` to `0.75rem` (rounded-xl) for a softer, friendlier look.
2. Install `framer-motion` for the card flip animation. It is critical for the 'Front/Back' experience.
3. Create a data file `src/data/flipbookContent.js` to hold the content for 24 pages (mock data for now).
4. Use the specified Earthy Color Palette. Do NOT use default Tailwind blues or grays.
5. Ensure the 'Download' section is prominent on the landing page, as users might just want the PDF.
6. For the Viewer: Implement a 'Flashcard' component that has a `isFlipped` state.
universal_guidelines: Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Never use pure black (#000000). Use the defined dark brown/grey.
